name: Beach Sessions - Rockaway Beach Dance Series
blurb: Help launch a summer dance series! Support the work of visionary choreographers invited for the first season in Rockaway Beach, Queens!

name: RoadKill
blurb: A dynamic, highly physical dance theater piece about the boundaries we & society create for our friendships & relationships.

name: The Enchanted Forest
blurb: An original ballet production combining the tradition of classic story ballets like the Nutcracker with Irish dance.

name: 2020 an evening with The Rebirth Network
blurb: From passion project to professional touring company. Come see our work and become a living part of the journey.

name: Cats Paying Dues 10th Anniversary Celebration (3 Suites)
blurb: CPD's 10th Anniversary Celebration! Three World Premiere Tap Dance Suites including collaboration with Max ZT and House of Waters.

name: milkdreams
blurb: Funding the final leg of a 2.5 year creative process to put our evening length work up for a two week season at La MaMa in June.

name: Underground Crew "Wanderlust" 2016
blurb: Integrating all different styles into impulses through travel & time, Underground is putting on it's 5th professional dance production.

name: Elegant Universe: A World Dance Spectacular with Live Music
blurb: A whimsical multi-sensory theater performance that transports you through time & space. Paris-NYC-DC

name: Blind
blurb: Diego & Ana's new company Tango For All debuts this fall with a program that fuses the passion of tango with contemporary dance.

name: you'll still call me by name
blurb: Sonya Tayeh’s emotionally charged dance-symphony explores a mystifying, complex, jagged relationship between a mother and daughter.

name: Triangle Theory
blurb: The premier of Triangle Theory, a dance about triangles in three parts, at Roulette Intermedium November 28-30, 2016.

name: SleepWalks: The Body of Dreams
blurb: a multi-media dance performance based on the collaborative dreams of participants of SleepWalks overnight soundscape performances.

name: Variations of Silence & (RE)Variations by Form CDT
blurb: Support Form CDT's 2016/17 season! Two shows in two months; be prepared for intoxicating and physical dance that must be seen!

name: PORTABLE VINYL DANCE FLOOR FOR ELIOT SMITH COMPANY (UK)
blurb: Eliot Smith Dance Company needs your support to purchase its first Vinyl Dance Flooring for rehearsals, performances, tour and more!

name: You Are Here - Film
blurb: You Are Here is a performance based at the Wedgwood Institute in Stoke-on-Trent. We are fundraising to make a film of the performance.

name: (In)visible Dancing
blurb: A new edition of (In)visible Dancing by PROTEIN DANCE commissioned by Hull UK City of Culture 2017 celebrating dance and dance artists.

name: SILVERBACK - An Evening-Length Dance Theater Production
blurb: LoudHoundMovement’s newest evening-length work, Silverback, premieres April 7-8 at the Center for Performance Research in Brooklyn, NY

name: The Other Side
blurb: An immersive dance theater experience exploring the social dynamics of divisiveness and the potential for collective healing.

name: RESIST: VCU Dance Spring Senior Projects 2017
blurb: VCU Dance and Choreography seniors seeking support to present their capstone projects in a formal concert this April.

name: cullen&them presents YDC's: The Family Project
blurb: Please join these amazing young artists as they explore the nature and meaning of family in a deeply personal and creative performance.

name: What You Want
blurb: Alyssa Noble and Allie Pfeffer are co-producing and performing their evening-length dance show, What You Want, in DIDA's third season.

name: Richard Move presents XXYY & Martha@20 at New York Live Arts
blurb: A double bill at New York Live Arts exploring the gender identity spectrum and Move’s performance as 20th-century icon Martha Graham!

name: Sit, Eat and Chew 五味杂陈
blurb: A guided immersive dance through NYC’s Chinatown uncovers stories in an apartment, hair salon, park and beyond.

name: Production & Performance: the loneliest part of here is now
blurb: An immersive live performance and dance film experience that reminds us of our own magical ability to (re)tell story.

name: SYNAESTHESIA DANCE EXPERIENCE: 4D MULTISENSORY SHOW
blurb: Multimedia artists and dancers collaborate with technology to showcase their individual forms of synaesthesia: the crossing of senses.

name: 30 Dancers Planted in Pots Perform in a Park
blurb: Racoco is planting 30 dancers in dirt in oversized flower pots for a spectacular performance at Socrates Sculpture Park, 4pm, August 19

name: Gather on a Field of Quilts for a One-Night Performance
blurb: Come together for a summer night of stargazing, indigenous storytelling and dance with choreographer and activist Emily Johnson.

name: Nasty Humans
blurb: A dynamic and diverse evening of dance and text exploring the "nasty" and beautiful aspects of our humanity.

name: West Hollywood Dance Festival 2017
blurb: Celebrating the JOY of creativity, the RIGOR of professional dance training, and the TRANSFORMATIVE POWER of live dance performance!

name: Splintered Glass Fringe Festival Campaign
blurb: Splintered Glass is a Fringe Festival performance that explores the human desire to understand what lies beyond the surface of reality.

name: PERSON A
blurb: Help ‘PERSON A’ come to life. By supporting our project, you will help us realise our research, bring it to the stage and pay our team!

name: Contemporary Circus Show
blurb: An original, evening length, story-based circus show. Inspired by Paradise Lost, our show explores loyalty, betrayal, and friendship.

name: OREGON BIRD SKETCHES - ALDancers 15th anniversary
blurb: MUSIC LIVE • DANCE MODERN + video & musicians on stage: choir, solo pianist, iconic Polish cabaret songs by jazz singer and pianist

name: Performing Valeska (Part One)
blurb: Performing Valeska is a dance theater solo project based on the life of Berlin avant garde performance artist Valeska Gert.

name: Eleven Eleven: A High-Energy Meditation On Coincidence
blurb: Rainbow Fletcher | HYPERNOVA joins collaborative forces in a bold new project that showcases original choreography, music, and film.

name: "To the things themselves!"
blurb: A new dance exploring both my allergy to "about" & the inescapable need to make meaning, at The Chocolate Factory, Dec 5-15.

name: The For C.J. Initiative
blurb: Help me use dance to spread awareness about the hidden dangers of asthma and provide resources to mitigate them!

name: Jenn Freeman // Freemove Dance presents "...it's time..."
blurb: A world premiere evening of dance co-presented by the Theater at the 14th Street Y, with a live drum score by composer, Dani Markham.

name: Bakanal de Afrique 2018: Afro Urban Festival
blurb: Four hundred years in the making, BdA celebrates the many histories & traditions blended into the odyssey of the African Diaspora.

name: MURRdance at the Columbus Arts Fest
blurb: I am creating 2 new dance pieces to be premiered by MURRdance in the Columbus Arts Festival on June 9, 2019.

name: MMDC at Triskelion Arts!
blurb: Mari Meade Dance Collective/MMDC is premiering an evening length work at Triskelion Arts June 6th, 7th, and 8th 2019

name: Known Mass No. 3, "St. Maurice"
blurb: A Live Performance In Which Six Women Reconstruct A Deconsecrated Church Using A Sheet, A Bathtub, Their Voices, & Their Bodies

name: The Dances are For Us
blurb: Investigating the Instrumentalization of Israeli Folk Dance

name: CREST 2019 Premiere
blurb:
A dance work exploring the finite yet resilient nature of life. 
By accepting the truth and death of things liberation is found.

name: IYKYK (if you know you know)
blurb: One Concert with a One Week Intermission

name: mignolo dance 2021-2022 season
blurb: Support the 2021-2022 performance season of ~mignolo dance~

name: the feath3r theory: Season 12: Ephemeral
blurb:
This month we are launching our 12th season as a company!  
The Season of the Ephemeral!

name: Juniper Project Live Performance
blurb: A fusion bellydance live show with live-streaming option available.

name: ⟦ ember*night ⟧ Penlights
blurb: Electronic light sticks with custom-printed inserts; Excellent for cheering at live concerts!

name: Asian American Ballet Project
blurb: The very first Asian American ballet company debuts in July at the Cambridge Multicultural Arts Center.
